data.eml:eml: THE FIRST GALLIENIELLIDAE (ARANEAE) FROM EASTERN AFRICA

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Warui, C., Jocque, R. (2002): THE FIRST GALLIENIELLIDAE (ARANEAE) FROM EASTERN AFRICA. The Journal of Arachnology 30 (1), No. 1: 307-315, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.819918
